title: PACE Institute of Technology and Sciences: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: PACE Institute of Technology and Sciences Admission 2024 is open for various courses. PACE Institute of Technology and Sciences Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on PACE Institute of Technology and Sciences Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

PACE Institute of Technology and Sciences Facilities
description: There are 40 computers with Broad Band connectivity 10 MBPS BSNL leased line.
The college has separate hostel for boys and girls with capacity of accommodating 384 and 296 students respectively.

The Institution organizes a three day festival, named PACEFEST as a part of Founder’s Week Celebrations every year and conducts State Level Inter Engineering Collegiate Competitions in Technical Paper Presentations, Technical Exhibition, Literary and Cultural Activities, Sports and Games Activities. During PACEFEST performances by Veterans, Celebrities will be arranged in Dance, Drama, Mimicry, Mime, Music etc.

Section.name: About PITS
Section.description:
PACE Institute of Technology and Sciences was established in the year 2007 by Srinivasa Education Society. The college is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada and approved by AICTE. It offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate in Engineering. It also offers Diploma and M.B.A programme

Computer Centre:
There are 40 computers with Broad Band connectivity 10 MBPS BSNL leased line.
Hostel:
The college has separate hostel for boys and girls with capacity of accommodating 384 and 296 students respectively.
Festival:
The Institution organizes a three day festival, named PACEFEST as a part of Founder’s Week Celebrations every year and conducts State Level Inter Engineering Collegiate Competitions in Technical Paper Presentations, Technical Exhibition, Literary and Cultural Activities, Sports and Games Activities. During PACEFEST performances by Veterans, Celebrities will be arranged in Dance, Drama, Mimicry, Mime, Music etc.
